  • Constructor Details

    • BS_Host_ViewModel

      public BS_Host_ViewModel()
      The BS_Host_ViewModel function is the constructor for the BS_Host_ViewModel class. It initializes a new BookScrabbleHostFacade object and adds itself as an observer to it. It also calls two other functions, initializeProperties() and initializeUpdateMap(), which are explained below. initializeProperties() initializes all the properties of the class. initializeUpdateMap() initializes the updatesMap, which is a map of all the updates.

  • Method Details

    • initializeUpdateMap

      public void initializeUpdateMap()
      The initializeUpdateMap function is a function that initializes the updatesMap. The updatesMap is a map that contains all of the possible messages from the facade to this viewModel, and their corresponding actions. For example: if we get an update saying "hand updated", then we will call setHand() in order to update our hand accordingly.
      Specified by:
      initializeUpdateMap in interface BS_ViewModel

    • setWordsForChallenge

      public void setWordsForChallenge(List<String> wordsList)
      The setWordsForChallenge function takes in a list of strings and sets the value of each viewable word to one of those strings. It then notifies observers that it has changed.

      Specified by:
      setWordsForChallenge in interface BS_ViewModel
      Parameters:
      wordsList - Set the words for the challenge

    • setBoard

      public void setBoard()
      The setBoard function is used to update the viewableBoard with the current state of the board. This function is called by HostFacade whenever a change has been made to the board, and it notifies all observers that there has been a change.

      Specified by:
      setBoard in interface BS_ViewModel

    • initializeProperties

      public void initializeProperties()
      The initializeProperties function initializes all of the properties that are used in the GUI. It also creates a HashMap called updatesMap, which is used to store information about what has been updated and needs to be displayed on the GUI. The function also creates an ArrayList called viewableScores, which stores information about each player's score and name. This list is then bound to a list of textField in MainGUI so that it can be displayed there.
      Specified by:
      initializeProperties in interface BS_ViewModel

    • setHand

      public void setHand()
      The setHand function is used to update the viewable hand of the player.
      Specified by:
      setHand in interface BS_ViewModel

    • setScore

      public void setScore()
      The setScore function is used to update the score of each player in the game. It does this by iterating through a list of players and updating their scores accordingly. It then notifies all observers that there has been a change in order to update the GUI.
      Specified by:
      setScore in interface BS_ViewModel

    • openSocket

      public void openSocket()
      The openSocket function opens a socket connection to the server. It does this by taking in the IP address and port number from the GUI and passing them to the HostFacade.
      Specified by:
      openSocket in interface BS_ViewModel

    • tryPlaceWord

      public void tryPlaceWord(String word, int row, int col, boolean isVertical)
      The tryPlaceWord function is used to place a word on the board. It does this by taking in the word, row, column, and orientation from the GUI and passing them to the HostFacade.

      Specified by:
      tryPlaceWord in interface BS_ViewModel
      Parameters:
      word - Pass the word that is being placed on the board
      row - Specify the row where the word is to be placed
      col - Determine the column of the board where the word will be placed
      isVertical - Determine if the word is placed vertically or horizontally

    • passTurn

      public void passTurn()
      The passTurn function is called when the player clicks on the "Pass" button. It calls a function in the hostFacade that will pass turn to another player.
      Specified by:
      passTurn in interface BS_ViewModel

    • setPlayerProperties

      public void setPlayerProperties(String name)
      The setPlayerProperties function is called from the view with the TextField value of the player name. It then calls a function in the hostFacade that will set the name of the player.

      Specified by:
      setPlayerProperties in interface BS_ViewModel
      Parameters:
      name - Set the name of the player

    • startNewGame

      public void startNewGame()
      The startNewGame function is called when the user clicks on the "Start New Game" button. It calls a function in HostFacade that will start a new game.
      Specified by:
      startNewGame in interface BS_ViewModel

    • challengeRequest

      public void challengeRequest(String challengeWord)
      The challengeRequest function is called when the user clicks on the challenge button. It sends a request to the server to activate a challenge, and then clears all the viewable words for challenge.
      Specified by:
      challengeRequest in interface BS_ViewModel
      Parameters:
      challengeWord - Pass the challenge word to the server

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      The endGame function is called when the game has ended, after winner was displayed. It calls a function in HostFacade that will end the game (the "End Game" button will be enabled only when all clients are disconnected).
      Specified by:
      endGame in interface BS_ViewModel

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, Object arg)
      The update function is called by the observable object when it changes. The update function then calls the appropriate method in this class to handle that change.
